mapper.select:
select
from
and tenant_id = #{tenantId} and lottery_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{lotteryId}), '%') and lottery_title like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{lotteryTitle}), '%') and lottery_detail like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{lotteryDetail}), '%') and lottery_type like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{lotteryType}), '%') and reward like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{reward}), '%') and reward_amount like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{rewardAmount}), '%') and vaild_date like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{vaildDate}), '%') and expire_date like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{expireDate}), '%') and reward_valid_date like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{rewardValidDate}), '%') and reward_expire_date like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{rewardExpireDate}), '%') and numbero like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{numbero}), '%') and status like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{status}), '%') and cost like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{cost}), '%') and cost_type like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{costType}), '%') and reward_type like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{rewardType}), '%') and cycle_amount like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{cycleAmount}), '%') and cycle_period like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{cyclePeriod}), '%') and cycle_type like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{cycleType}), '%')
mapper.insert:
insert into
( tenant_id, lottery_id, lottery_title, lottery_detail, lottery_type, reward, reward_amount, vaild_date, expire_date, reward_valid_date, reward_expire_date, numbero, cost, cost_type, reward_type, cycle_amount, cycle_period, cycle_type) values
( #{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.lotteryId}, #{entity.lotteryTitle}, #{entity.lotteryDetail}, #{entity.lotteryType}, #{entity.reward}, #{entity.rewardAmount}, #{entity.vaildDate}, #{entity.expireDate}, #{entity.rewardValidDate}, #{entity.rewardExpireDate}, #{entity.numbero}, #{entity.cost}, #{entity.costType}, #{entity.rewardType}, #{entity.cycleAmount}, #{entity.cyclePeriod}, #{entity.cycleType})

insert into
( tenant_id, lottery_id, lottery_title, lottery_detail, lottery_type, reward, reward_amount, vaild_date, expire_date, reward_valid_date, reward_expire_date, numbero, status, cost, cost_type, reward_type, cycle_amount, cycle_period, cycle_type) values
(#{entity.tenantId},#{entity.lotteryId},#{entity.lotteryTitle},#{entity.lotteryDetail},#{entity.lotteryType},#{entity.reward},#{entity.rewardAmount},#{entity.vaildDate},#{entity.expireDate},#{entity.rewardValidDate},#{entity.rewardExpireDate},#{entity.numbero},#{entity.status},#{entity.cost},#{entity.costType},#{entity.rewardType},#{entity.cycleAmount},#{entity.cyclePeriod},#{entity.cycleType})
on duplicate key update tenant_id=values(tenant_id), lottery_id=values(lottery_id), lottery_title=values(lottery_title), lottery_detail=values(lottery_detail), lottery_type=values(lottery_type), reward=values(reward), reward_amount=values(reward_amount), vaild_date=values(vaild_date), expire_date=values(expire_date), reward_valid_date=values(reward_valid_date), reward_expire_date=values(reward_expire_date), numbero=values(numbero), status=values(status), cost=values(cost), cost_type=values(cost_type), reward_type=values(reward_type), cycle_amount=values(cycle_amount), cycle_period=values(cycle_period), cycle_type=values(cycle_type)
